mapper.sql: order_id, order_no, staff_id, mobile,order_money, order_status, account, remarks, add_time,update_time
mapper.select:
select
from org_staff_cash where 1=1
and order_status = #{orderStatus,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
order by add_time desc
mapper.update:
update org_staff_cash
order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
staff_id = #{staffId,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=CHAR},
order_money = #{orderMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
order_status = #{orderStatus,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
account = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
where order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.insert:

order_no,
staff_id,

order_status,
account,
remarks,
